00011 /* Returns a hashptr which point to a new hashtable with 
00012 'size' buckets. Each bucket is a linked h_list */
00013 
00014 class HashTable {
00015 
00016  public:
00017   HashTable( long size );
00018   
00019   
00020   /* Frees all the memory associated with h_lists in hashtable
00021          and ahstable structure itself */
00022   ~HashTable();
00023   
00024   /***********************************************/
00025   
00026   /* get all key words from hash table */
00027   unsigned long ** key_list(); 
00028   
00029   /* get all value words from hash table */
00030   int* value_list(); 
00031   
00032   /* get number of items that have been inserted
00033    * into the hash table */
00034   int num_items();
00035   
00036   /* hashes key, inserts key AND VALUE into hash entry */
00037   void insert(unsigned long key, int value);
00038   
00039   /* removes h_list at hash */
00040   void remove_key( unsigned long key);
00041   
00042   /* get the value at the key supplied */
00043   int get_value( unsigned long key );
00044   
00045   /* prints each h_list in hash table */
00046   void print_hashtable();
00047   
00048   /* print only items not in filter h_list */
00049   //void print_filtered_hash(int argc, char ** argv, hashptr hptr);
00050   
00051   /* contains an entry that hashes to this key */
00052   int contains_hash_key( unsigned long key);
00053   
00054   
00055   
00056   /* Remove the exact key-value pair from the hash table.
00057    * Returns: boolean indicated whether item was in table to 
00058    * begin with.
00059    */
00060   int remove_item(unsigned long key, int value);
00061
